snippet.title: While Waiting | Gameplay Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
While Waiting is a new #puzzlegame presented by the team behind the game "Moncage".
➡️​ A free demo is available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2449160/While_Waiting/ 

#WhileWaiting invites you to wait for things to happen! From humorous situations like waiting for the end of a meeting with your boss or waiting at the supermarket checkout, to more poignant moments like waiting for a call from a loved one, you will experience a wide range of emotions as you grow older.

🕰️​ Doing Nothing is the Ultimate Strategy: Embrace the essence of the game by understanding that waiting is the key to clearing each situation. No shortcuts or actions can expedite the waiting time.
🧩​ Explore and solve meaningless challenges to collect stickers!
​🎮​ Replay levels to collect all the stickers.
🌞​100 hilarious situations inspired by reel life. Follow Adam's life from birth to death and experience some important life decisions and feelings.
❤️An emotional storytelling. The narrative tackles themes of friendship, love, family, loneliness, loss and self-discovery will resonate with you.

Follow us on social for more info:
X https://x.com/PlayOptillusion 
Instagram https://www.instagram.com/optillusiongames/ 
Twitch https://www.twitch.tv/optillusiongames 
Discord https://discord.gg/MCsR3sXqxN
